com.ibanity.apis.client.services

Interface AccountsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountsServiceImpl

    public interface AccountsService
    Service for Accounts related APIs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get an account information request that will contain the URI to be redirected to the PSU (end-user) Web Browser.

      Get a specific Financial Institution Customer's account
      List<Account> getCustomerAccounts(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken)
      Get ALL customer accounts (from all authorized financial institutions) note: In an account object's, the financialInstitution property object, only the financialInstitution.id is populated

      Get ALL customer accounts (from all authorized financial institutions) note: In an account object's, the financialInstitution property object, only the financialInstitution.id is populated

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomerAccount

        Account getCustomerAccount(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken,
                           UUID accountId,
                           UUID financialInstitutionId)
                    throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Get a specific Financial Institution Customer's account
        Parameters:
        customerAccessToken - the token generated by the call to the corresponding service (See @link com.ibanity.services.CustomerAccessTokenService#createCustomerAccessToken(CustomerAccessToken)}
        accountId - the UUID of the account
        financialInstitutionId - the Id of the financial institution to be used
        Returns:
        the account
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the provided ID is not known

      • getCustomerAccounts

        List<Account> getCustomerAccounts(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken)
        Get ALL customer accounts (from all authorized financial institutions) note: In an account object's, the financialInstitution property object, only the financialInstitution.id is populated
        Parameters:
        customerAccessToken - the token generated by the call to the corresponding service (See @link com.ibanity.services.CustomerAccessTokenService#createCustomerAccessToken(CustomerAccessToken)}
        Returns:
        list of all customer's accounts

      • getCustomerAccounts

        List<Account> getCustomerAccounts(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken,
                                  IbanityPagingSpec pagingSpec)
        Get ALL customer accounts (from all authorized financial institutions) note: In an account object's, the financialInstitution property object, only the financialInstitution.id is populated
        Parameters:
        customerAccessToken - the token generated by the call to the corresponding service (See @link com.ibanity.services.CustomerAccessTokenService#createCustomerAccessToken(CustomerAccessToken)}
        pagingSpec - The paging specification to be used for tuning the resulting list
        Returns:
        list of all customer's accounts

      • getCustomerAccounts

        List<Account> getCustomerAccounts(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken,
                                  UUID financialInstitutionId)
                           throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Get customer's accounts from a particular financial institution note: In an account object's, the financialInstitution property object, only the financialInstitution.id is populated
        Parameters:
        customerAccessToken - the token generated by the call to the corresponding service (See @link com.ibanity.services.CustomerAccessTokenService#createCustomerAccessToken(CustomerAccessToken)}
        financialInstitutionId - the Id of the financial institution to be used
        Returns:
        list of customer's accounts in the specified financial institution
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the provided ID is not known

      • getCustomerAccounts

        List<Account> getCustomerAccounts(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken,
                                  UUID financialInstitutionId,
                                  IbanityPagingSpec pagingSpec)
                           throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Get customer's accounts from a particular financial institution note: In an account object's, the financialInstitution property object, only the financialInstitution.id is populated
        Parameters:
        customerAccessToken - the token generated by the call to the corresponding service (See @link com.ibanity.services.CustomerAccessTokenService#createCustomerAccessToken(CustomerAccessToken)}
        financialInstitutionId - the Id of the financial institution to be used
        pagingSpec - The paging specification to be used for tuning the resulting list
        Returns:
        list of customer's accounts in the specified financial institution
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the provided ID is not known

      • getAccountInformationAccessRequest

        AccountInformationAccessRequest getAccountInformationAccessRequest(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken,
                                                                   AccountInformationAccessRequest accountInformationAccessRequest)
        Get an account information request that will contain the URI to be redirected to the PSU (end-user) Web Browser. The Redirect URI will redirect the end-user to the Financial Institution in order to authorize Ibanity to access the selected bank accounts
        Parameters:
        customerAccessToken - the token generated by the call to the corresponding service (See @link com.ibanity.services.CustomerAccessTokenService#createCustomerAccessToken(CustomerAccessToken)}
        accountInformationAccessRequest - Information related to the request: redirect URI : to redirect the end-user to the TPP page after the authorization flow has been completed, this URI needs to be a URI referenced in the Ibanity Portal consentReference: the consent reference financialInstitution.id : the ID of the financial institution to which we're gonna ask the accounts access
        Returns:
        an accountInformationAccessRequest containing a redirect URI (property: links.redirect) to be provided, as redirect response, to the end-user browser

      • getAccountsInformationAccessAuthorizations

        List<AccountInformationAccessAuthorization> getAccountsInformationAccessAuthorizations(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken,
                                                                                       UUID financialInstitutionId,
                                                                                       UUID accountInformationAccessRequestId)
                                                                                throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Get the list of Account Access Authorizations
        Parameters:
        customerAccessToken - the token generated by the call to the corresponding service (See @link com.ibanity.services.CustomerAccessTokenService#createCustomerAccessToken(CustomerAccessToken)}
        financialInstitutionId - the financial institution id
        accountInformationAccessRequestId - the account access request id
        Returns:
        the list of authorizations details
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the provided ID is not known

                                                                                       IbanityPagingSpec pagingSpec)

        accountInformationAccessRequestId - the account access request id
        pagingSpec - The paging specification to be used for tuning the resulting list
        Returns:
        the list of authorizations details
        Throws:

      • revokeAccountsAccessAuthorization

        void revokeAccountsAccessAuthorization(CustomerAccessToken customerAccessToken,
                                       UUID financialInstitutionId,
                                       AccountInformationAccessAuthorization accountInformationAccessAuthorization)
                                throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Revoke an Account Access Authorization
        Parameters:
        customerAccessToken - the token generated by the call to the corresponding service (See @link com.ibanity.services.CustomerAccessTokenService#createCustomerAccessToken(CustomerAccessToken)}
        accountInformationAccessAuthorization - The Account Information Access Authorization which ID and accountInformation.id are set
        financialInstitutionId - The Id of the accounts' Financial Institution for which we want to Revoke the authorization
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the provided ID is not known
